headline: Is It Time To Reassess First Solar (FSLR) After Its Recent Pullback In Price
summary: If you are wondering whether First Solar's share price still makes sense after its recent run, this breakdown will help you frame what you are really paying for today. The stock last closed at US$225.52, with returns of 34.6% over 1 year, 34.1% over 3 years and 131.5% over 5 years. However, the shorter term picture shows a 6.9% fall over 7 days, a 13.7% decline over 30 days and a 17.8% drop year to date. Recent headlines have focused on First Solar as a key U.S. listed solar manufacturer at...
